Casualties 2: {{efn|This number does not include Japanese killed by Chinese forces in the Burma campaign and does not include Japanese killed in Manchuria}}
Result: * Chinese victory as part of the [[Allies of World War II|Allied]] victory in the [[Pacific War]]* Surrender of all Japanese forces in mainland China (excluding [[Manchuria]]), [[Formosa]]/[[Taiwan]], the [[Spratly Islands]], the [[Paracel Islands]], and [[French Indochina]] north of [[16th parallel north|16 degrees north]] to the [[Republic of China (1912-1949)|Republic of China]] after losing territory to China* China was one of the [[Big Four (World War II)|Big Four of the Allies]] and becomes a permanent member of the [[United Nations Security Council|U.N. Security Council]]* Resumption of the [[Chinese Civil War]]
